revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p:
although i have had a pretty hard day yet i felt as if i wanted to write a line before i went to bed although i am very tired indeed well Walt Jeffy and mattyMatty has started to night for st louLou is St. Louis they are to stop to pittsburgh Pittsburgh for a day and a night mattyMatty was about the same she cant can't doo do much as soon as she does any thing in the way of housework she vomits up all she eats she is far from well but the doctor speaks encouragely encouragingly of her but O waltWalt haint i had a seige siege they pretended to live up stairs but the provitions provisions was prepared down well Walter dear i have lived through it) but some things i have thought rather hard of they have never paid a cent of rent nor a cent of gass gas bill nor give me a dollar when they went away they gave me an allapacca alpaca dress when
they first came and Jeff bought me a little mite of a castor that is all about three weeks ago georgeGeorge bought 20lb of butter and they have used out off it ever since and mattyMatty borrowed 50 dollars of georgeGeorge but jeffyJeffy dident didn't settle it) they had plenty of money as jeffyJeffy drawed that out off the bank i did really think they had ought to give me some but let evey every thing go but i would ask more than 100 dl to go through the same again)

well waltWalt i dont don't hear any more from heydeHeyde the letter i sent to you was the last i got poor han i feel very bad about her its it's hard to know what to doo do as heydeHeyde seems to be determined none of the family shall come on there i got your letter walterWalter dear with the doctors on tuesday Tuesday all right
Dr enos is dead i suppose you see in the papers very suddenly

postscript.p: my love to all the OconorsO'Connors and keep a share for yourself
georgeGeorge has commenced his house they are digging the cellar
